name: #8 Farah Bordjia
description:
Farah Bordjia

Race: Human

Subraces and Variants:
Ethnicity: Bedine

Physical Characteristics:
Age: 24 years
Height: 5'9"
Weight: 130 lbs.
Eyes: Brown
Skin: Fair

Gender: Female
Class: Warlock
Otherworldly Patron: Ghost in the Machine
Background: Entertainer
Occupation: Soldier

Trait: I'll settle for nothing less than perfection.
Ideal: Honesty. Art should reflect the soul; it should come from within and reveal who we really are. (Any)
Bond: I want to be famous, whatever it takes.
Flaw: I have trouble keeping my true feelings hidden. My sharp tongue lands me in trouble.

Description:
Appearance: Birthmark
High Ability: Intelligence-studious, learned, inquisitive
Low Ability: Dexterity-clumsy, fumbling
Talent: Speaks several languages fluently
Mannerism: Fidgets
Interaction Trait: Quiet
Values: Self-knowledge (Any), Protective of colleagues or compatriots
Flaw or Secret: Foolhardy bravery
